CustomField.formula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(GIACTBusinessOwner_1_Validation__c,'Automated Approval'), ISPICKVAL(GIACTBusinessOwner_1_Validation__c,'Manual Approval'), ISPICKVAL(GIACTBusinessOwner_1_Validation__c,'Exception') ), OR( ISPICKVAL(GIACTBusinessOwner_2_Validation__c,'Automated Approval'), ISPICKVAL(GIACTBusinessOwner_2_Validation__c,'Manual Approval'), ISPICKVAL(GIACTBusinessOwner_2_Validation__c,'Exception'), ISPICKVAL(GIACTBusinessOwner_2_Validation__c,'') ), OR( ISPICKVAL(GIACTBusinessOwner_3_Validation__c,'Automated Approval'), ISPICKVAL(GIACTBusinessOwner_3_Validation__c,'Manual Approval'), ISPICKVAL(GIACTBusinessOwner_3_Validation__c,'Exception'), ISPICKVAL(GIACTBusinessOwner_3_Validation__c,'') ), OR( ISPICKVAL(GIACTBusinessOwner_4_Validation__c,'Automated Approval'), ISPICKVAL(GIACTBusinessOwner_4_Validation__c,'Manual Approval'), ISPICKVAL(GIACTBusinessOwner_4_Validation__c,'Exception'), ISPICKVAL(GIACTBusinessOwner_4_Validation__c,'') ), OR( ISPICKVAL(TIN_Match__c, 'Automated Approval'), ISPICKVAL(TIN_Match__c, 'Exception'), ISPICKVAL(TIN_Match__c, 'Manual Approval') ) )
CustomField.label: GIACT Underwriting Fields Complete
